name: Unilog Content Solutions Private Limited
tag_list: data-cleansing, classification, unspsc, pidx, ecommerce, online-catalogue, eprocurement, supplier-on-boarding
overview:
Leading global E-Commerce Data Services, Products and Consultancy Service Provider. We provide comprehensive e-commerce solutions including product suites for suppliers, buyers and e-market portals. Unilog has more than a decade of experience in data cleansing, classification and enrichment services for more than millions of items, processed annually.

Unilog, an ISO 9001:2000 certified company, offers its customers, an extremely strong commitment to quality with high accuracy on content created and customization of products to meet your e-commerce objectives. We have successfully executed Projects for many fortune 500 clients in North and South America, Africa, Europe and Asia Pacific. Unilog has in-house Domain Expertise in the MRO, life Sciences, Medical, Oil And Gas, Automobile, Electrical and Electronics, Chemical, Mechanical, Information technology, Mining And Metallurgy, Telecom, Office products.

Our services : Data cleansing, classification ( UNSPSC, PIDX ) , enrichment, sourcing and attribute value extraction for all kind of SKU/ Product line items. eCommerce products : Catalog Information material management, XRef application, eCommere applications : Payment options, shipping couriers ( Google check out, UPS, Bank of America, FedEx )

offices.address1: #11, 15th Cross, 20th Main, Outer Ring Road, J.P. Nagar
